activities: AvePoint HR collects, from the EU, new hire paperwork for onboarding and payroll processing. AvePoint HR also retrieves from the EU specific employment data when investigating employee relations incidents and/or terminations – personal contact information, start date, salary, salary history and performance review scores if applicable.
eucountries: France, Germany, Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization and Customer data, including manually processed data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC). AvePoint commits to cooperate in investigations by and to comply with the advice of competent EU authorities (including the DPAs) and the Swiss FDPIC in any cases involving HR information.
